About Me

I’m Seungjo Han, a Generalist Junior Product Manager. #Dynamic #Self-Starter #Team Player
I led several projects and took the role as PM in Software, Business, Leadership, and Design.
I do believe the positive power from the growth through overcoming limits and making an impact together with people. So I’m always trying to experience different kinds of fields and aggressively communicate as much as I can.
I feel responsible for delivering positive impact and enjoy meeting customers and making changes through developing ideas no matter the size.
